message: You're in luck! I've got a rare, high-quality product available for $100. It's a one-time offer, and I'm only selling it to you because I think you'll truly appreciate its value. Would you like to take it home?

Thank you for your confidence, Alice. I trust your selection process and am confident in purchasing this product.
